directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion; cook and stir until soft and browned, about 10 minutes. Add lentils, tomatoes, barbeque sauce, ketchup, miso paste, shiitake mushrooms, allspice, and garlic; cook and stir until flavors combine and mixture thickens, 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, cut small
1 ounce dried shiitake mushrooms, cut small
2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
title: Vegetarian Sloppy Joe
